body.p: MiramoDesigner <XRefDef>s are editted via the 'Manage Cross-reference formats' dialog which is accessible through the 'More' button at the bottom of the format definitions pane:

The default xref XRefDef includes a mix of language independent variables ($lang-onpage) and building blocks which include the paragraph text (<paragraphText>) and page number (<pageNumber>) of the target element:

A FontDef (eg xreflink) may be applied to all or part of the XRefDef contents by selecting text and/or building blocks, then using right-click to bring up the FontFormat context menu.
